§ 3786. Use or release restriction: definition In this subchapter, the term “use or release restriction”, with respect to technical data delivered to the United States under a contract subject to this section, means a restriction by the contractor or subcontractor on the right of the United States—(1) to use such technical data; or
(2) to release or disclose such technical data to persons outside the Government or permit the use of such technical data by persons outside the Government.
(Added and amended Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title XVIII, § 1833(g), (m), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 4231, 4233.)
